mapper.insert: insert into GOODS_SALES(NUM, GOODSCODE, NICKNAME, SALES, ORDERDATE) values(GOODS_SALES_SEQ.nextval, #{goodsCode}, #{nickname}, #{sales}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(GOODSCODE) from GOODS_SALES where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
select GOODSCODE, count(GOODSCODE) from GOODS_SALES group by GOODSCODE
